playn.core
Interface TextLayout

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTextLayout
public interface TextLayout

Contains metrics and metadata for a laid out body of text. The text may subsequently be rendered to a canvas.

Method Summary
 float ascent()
          The space from the top of a line of text to the baseline.
 float descent()
          The space from the baseline to the bottom of a line of text.
 TextFormat format()
          The TextFormat used to lay out this text.
 float height()
          The height of the bounding box that contains all of the rendered text.
 float leading()
          The space between the bottom of one line of text and the top of the next line of text.
 pythagoras.f.Rectangle lineBounds(int line)
          The bounds of the text on the given line.
 int lineCount()
          The number of lines of text contained in this layout (after wrapping).
 float width()
          The width of the bounding box that contains all of the rendered text.
